concept.title: Safe Installation, Use, and Service
concept.shortdesc: The proper installation, use, and servicing of this water heater is extremely important to your safety and the safety of others.

conbody.p: The proper installation, use, and servicing of this is extremely important to your safety and the safety of others.

Many safety-related messages and instructions have been provided in this manual and on your own to warn you and others of a potential injury hazard. Read and obey all safety messages and instructions throughout this manual. It is very important that the meaning of each safety message is understood by you and others who install, use, or service this
All safety messages will generally tell you about the type of hazard, what can happen if you do not follow the safety message, and how to avoid the risk of injury.

The California Safe Drinking Water and Toxic Enforcement Act requires the Governor of California to publish a list of substances known to the State of California to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm, and requires businesses to warn of potential exposure to such substances.
conbody.note: This product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm. This appliance can cause low level exposure to some of the substances listed in the Act.
